title: OUC FAQ and Rules
body:
Hey everyone,

[Full announcement and details](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-event/rally-your-classmates-next-uni-tournament)

I'll be common questions and answers to them below;

Here you can find a full version of the [rules for OUC](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BwYF_ARg_cwBMzAzVFZQMFdxV1U/view?usp=sharing)

**Questions**

Q: If i am a single player can i join a team or join as a solo player? or do i need a whole team to join/play?
A: You need to register as a full team, if you are looking for more team members head on over to the [OUC sub board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship)

** EDIT

Rule update

A placeholder is where you pick a champion in place of a champion that you do not own, with the intent to swap the champion you don’t own with a teammate who does own it. Teams may choose to use placeholders. If they meet the following conditions

● Must first inform the other team in the pre game lobby.

● Have a screenshot of you clearly informing the other team in the pre game lobby.

● Add a member of the other team and communicate which champion is the

placeholder during champion select.

● Have a screenshot of this communication that also clearly shows 30 seconds or

more on the champion select timer before the placeholder is locked in.

replies.body: nsw tourny held on the same day as a sydney lan >.<
Should play in the tournament from the LAN =)
Will you guys be flying managers over along with their teams?
No unfortunately the prize for this tournament is only for the 5 participating players
Hey guys. Has anyone recieved there scheduling emails? was meant to be sent at midday today but its 3:30pm and havent recieved anything

Update,

Schedule will be released at 6pm AEST tonight. Links will be posted on the boards
Have they been released ? I dont seem to be able to find the link
i cant find them either.
Its for the suspense {{champion:35}}
I signed up my team for Charles Darwin University and one of my members is thinking of not competing anymore. Is it still possible to change players?

Email me at Maraudaur@riotgames.com

with all the details of the new player and which player they are replacing

I signed up my team from The University of Western Australia but may have gotten the e-mail address wrong. Hence why I haven't received an e-mail confirmation. I Put our student e-mail down as @student.edu.uwa.au but it's supposed to be @student.uwa.edu.au How am I able to change this? I have like a few hours before sign ups are closed. 

- Xiao
Hey Xiaomayne, I can get that fixed up for you what was your team name called?
Team UWA or something I forgot haha, 21319899 was the captains student ID or Xiaomayne was the IGN
Also, I would like to edit the team page cause I wanted to add 1 sub player ID - 21291885 and e-mail 21291885@student.uwa.edu.au

Hey Xiao,

Need their name and IGN aswell
Primordial Burst IGN, Jeremy Ciccarelli
updated for you

Hello Maraudaur, My sub and current main roster player cannot make the saturday games. I will have another sub ready before the cut off at 4pm+8GMT today. Which is like in 2 hours. I'll post the Student ID/Email here asap.  Thankyou

21501036@student.uwa.edu.au - new SUB
IGN - Krunches
Do you know what time today the brackets/team rosters are released today for QLD?
Hey Brackets will be released tomorrow midday. There has been a slight delay.

Hey man,

Since i just enrolled in my uni i dont have a student card until August 8th, what can I do to prove my identity?

Hey man,

Registrations close tomorrow night 6pm AEST (extended by one day)

What you should do is submit a photo of proof of enrollment
I mean best I've found is an email that says welcome to the uni, is that enough?
Yup that will do, but we will be contacting you again once you have your ID
Hi, one of our teammate is a new international students in the university and haven't acquired a student card, however, they're able to show their passport Is that alright to sign up?
That should be fine, but use a proof of enrollment in the picture not passport.
Hey Marauder, i have submitted my team but we may have a reserve or two willing to help us out. How do i submit these new reserves to my team?

Please email me Maraudaur@riotgames.com and let me know your student ID , Team name and the following details for each player

First and last name
IGN
student ID
Student email

Hey there, 
I'm on a QUT team, and am filling out the registration form now. However its asking for a picture of myself and my student ID. Since I am a new student I do not have one yet, and won't be able to get one until wednesday. Is there anything I can do? The last thing I want is to prevent my team from entering because I haven't been able to get an ID yet :( 
Thanks
You should take a photo of your self with some document that is proof of enrollment. Then once you have the ID let the tournament admins know.
Thanks so much, and will do. I'll get that done asap!

Hey Maraudaur i have a team all set but because I've been busy i didn't notice the sign up date was closed today. One of my team mates didnt reply with the info needed for me to process the application. Is there someone I can email directly with all the information that i have so far? Im also positive he should reply back sometime tomorrow with the rest of the details. We all did this same tournament last semester, we are from AUT in NZ. My email is caleb-paul1@hotmail.com
Hey mate sign ups close 6pm AEST tonight so you still have time!
Ok cheers its all in.

Regarding the qualifying institutions...

I'm from the ACT and attending the Academy of Interactive Entertainment doing a Game Design course. Definite interest here, and have some mates I could put together a team with, but it's not on the list of approved institutions. The AIE offers a range of Advanced Diploma and Degree courses, so not sure if that would count as a university for this?

Also, I feel I should point out, that the University of New South Wales operates the ADFA campus in the ACT as well, which is most certainly a university. Not sure if a team from there is gonna happen or not, but it should also be on your list. :)

Hey guys,

We definitely don't want to exclude anyone. Get your team together and participate I will get though institutions added to the list!
How will you guys notice us on who we are vs and when we are vs them?
Hey we will release brackets and announce schedules once the registrations close. We will also email out to the team captains when we have done this.
Hi there, is it okay if our team members are not level 30? If it is, how would it be played as we would not have runes/masteries as the level 30?

It's fine if your team isn't level 30. However if you dont have all the runes and masteries you will be at a bit of disadvantage. Should definitely participate anyway! lots of good fun and even get a mini prize just for signing up.
What if we have players from same university but different country ?  Aus and Nz ?

Hey,

You will need to be from the same campus

Hey Marauder. I have a question. I have a team and we are going to sign up, we are all part of the same university - University of Western Sydney, but what happens if one of our members goes to a different campus.
If it is in the same city/region then it is fine

How will the games be hosted? Would it be held of the AARNET (Fibre connection between various Unis) or held at a venune?

If venue, are custom builts allowed? Incase there are people who use 2rd Party Programmes to play.

Hey,

The tournament will be played online until the grand finals which will be held live in studio.
